entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: plainTextWithFilter #49268
  • IActionResult and IAsyncDisposable #49266
  • ASP.NET Core Logging Azure Site Extension causes 500.30 ANCM Startup Error #49265
  • [Blazor] Have a way to configure dotnet runtime for blazor apps #49264
  • QuickGrid add OverscanCount parameter #49263
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #49256
  • Incorrect Resolution of Query Parameter in ASP.NET Core (.NET 7) #49255

Closed

  • Winform & Blazor can't show image in local #49202
  • Perf regression: https #49257
  • Avoid authentication redirect if previously authenticated and valid token exist #49242
  • On refresh of blazor webpage it loads forever. #49121
  • Remove hosted from blazor wasm templates descriptions #48951
    8.0-preview7
  • Scroll doesn't work when calling NavigationManager.NavigateTo() same url with query and hash #48993
    8.0-preview7
  • [Blazor] Reenable ICU sharding tests #49191
    8.0-rc1
  • GET request with Content-Type multipart/form-data causes validation error #49252
  • Handle dotnet/extensions scenarios in ASP.NET metrics middleware #48666
  • Blazor Virtualize: Empty Rows Template #28770
    Backlog
  • Perf regression: fortunes #49240

PullRequests

Created

  • Update package baseline for 7.0 #49269
    area-infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2216668 #49267
    area-mvc
  • Forms streamline #49261
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Change message for stale PR #49270
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview7
  • Remove redundant SourceBuildTrimNetFrameworkTargets property #49022
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-preview7
  • Remove hosted from blazor wasm templates descriptions #48969
    area-mvc, area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-preview7
  • Bug hash routing same page with params or query #48994
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-preview7
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `b239fb5` to `9a77922` #49260
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview7
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `251e720` to `be03d00` #49259
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview7
  • enable markdown linter #49254
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview7
  • Revert "[Blazor] Skip tests broken by bad dependency update (#49200)" #49258
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview7
  • Add EmptyContent parameter to Virtualize component #49185
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0-preview7
  • Improve debugging of produces and accepts metadata #49253
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview7
  • [release/7.0] Backport pr 48892 to 7.0 #48911
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0.10

Updated

  • [Blazor] Improvements to the interaction between SSR and interactive rendering #49238
    area-blazor
  • Remove ApiAuthorization.IdentityServer #49193
    area-identity
  • Support for X-Forwarded-Prefix in ForwardedHeadersMiddleware #49249
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Update RDG to use interceptors feature #48817
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Update area-owners.md #49229
    area-infrastructure
  • Update JwtBearer and WsFederation to use updated IdentityModel #48966
    area-security, pending-ci-rerun
  • Draft: Add RedirectToActionOther method. #48823
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [WIP] Support metadata only endpoints #46536
    area-routing
  • Add support for F# `Async<'T>` as an awaitable type in minimal APIs #46898
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-minimal
  • Introduce per-HealthCheckRegistration parameters #42646
    area-healthchecks, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Reduce record usage in published projects #48907
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [blazor][wasm] Dispatch rendering to main thread #48991
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, pending-ci-rerun
  • Change the way we detect Node.js in SignalR JS/TS client. #49066
    area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun
  • Enable IDE0005 analyzer in the build #49080
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add WithOrder to IEndpointConventionBuilder #49093
    area-runtime, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Change AddServerSideBlazor to call services.AddRazorComponents().AddServerComponents() #49106
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add WebApplication.CreateEmptyBuilder #49246
    area-runtime, area-hosting
  • Do not emit unused fields in RDG source #48426
    community-contribution, feature-rdg, area-minimal
